title: Ratio Drop Dropper Lever for SRAM Shifters
content:
Ratio Technology, known for its drop bar to mountain bike conversation kits, just announced its Drop Dropper retrofit kit for SRAM shifters. The Drop Dropper is installed in the left lever, previously reserved for front derailleur shifter paddles. Once installed, the lever can actuate a dropper post from the hoods or drops, providing easy operation over any terrain. The dropper lever is available for both SRAM 11 and Apex 12-speed mechanical shifters. Roll on over to Ratio TechnologyÂ to see more!
